content.rendered:
FALL BEAUTY TREND REPORT

Finally feels like Fall on October 1st and I’m updating my beauty game while getting into the holiday spirit.

Berry tones for Fall is nothing new, but we all love it! It’s universally flattering on different skin tones and always looks beautiful and classic during Fall. I’m loving berry lipstick, nail polish, and eyeshadows.

Add flair and drama to your daytime look with my popular D’Lashes invisible band half false lashes. You can shop for them here.

Also, don’t forget to make your lash extension appointments in advance! Appointments fill up quickly especially during holiday season. You can make your lash appointments directly on my website and app! Click here to make an appointment. Also, check out some of my favorite beauty trends for Fall below.

  1. Chanel nail polish in Mythique, 2.OPI Como Se Llama nail polish, 3. Gisou honey infused hair oil for cold weather protection and hydration. 4. Charlotte Tilbury eyeshadow. 5. Drink your greens to your health with Welleco Super Elixir greens. 6. D’Lashes beauty lipstick, brow pencil, and lashes. Click to shop here.

LOVE DIONNE
